entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Android PopModalAsync still fails when popping a NavigationPage after latest review update (.NET 7) #10656
  • Default VS symbol loading mechanism does not work #10654
  • Attached Property Errors #10652
  • [Windows] Image is not centered in AspectFill mode #10645
    Backlog
  • Validate Windows buttons have round corners #10644
    7.0
  • Frame.CornerRadius not working on iOS #10643
    Backlog
  • [Android] Multiple navigation bars appear for FlyoutPage (MAUI ver. 6.0.541) #10634
  • CollectionView with ItemTemplate containing Images with UriImageSource throws TaskCanceledException when scrolling #10632
    Backlog
  • UI not adapting size on macOS (when resizing) and iPad (when rotated) #10631
  • [WinUI] Flashy backgrounds on start #10629
  • Lottie animation not visible on Page from ServiceProvider #10628
  • Pair to Mac failed with the error “The Xcode license status couldn't be verified because Xcode has not been found...” #10627
  • Assembly 'Microsoft.Maui' Version=1.0.0.0 uses 'Microsoft.iOS, Version=16.0.0.0 which has a higher version than referenced assembly 'Microsoft.iOS' 15.4.300.0 -- FAILED. #10626

Closed

  • Symbols missing for 7.0.0-rc.2 #10650
  • Shadow Radius is rendered differently on platforms #10630
  • Label.LineBreakMode = TailTruncation not working properly on iOS & macOS #10633
  • ToolbarItem's IconImageSource : Dynamic source change from embedded image resource bug. #10648
    Backlog
  • Microsoft.Maui.ApplicationModel.VersionTracking.Default throws exception #10499
  • The ResourceDictionary has duplicate template options #10202
    7.0
  • Line coordinates are not respected #10415
    Backlog
  • Shapes are top-left aligned #9089
    7.0
  • Directory Not Found of DLL from .Net MAUI class library in folder Debug\net6.0-android\android-x64 #10150
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [MacCatalyst] SearchBar background color is not working #10482
    Backlog
  • MAUI should not use private targets from iOS build tasks #10272
    7.0
  • Fail to install MAUI from main branch with error "Failed to install manifest microsoft.net.workload.mono.toolchain version 6.0.10... is not found in NuGet feeds" #10600
    Backlog
  • Windows Publish failing with WindowsPackageType is set to None, but PublishAppxPackage is set to true. #10576

PullRequests

Created

  • Always disconnect when handler changes #10655
  • Fix how PopToRoot propagates to handler #10653
  • Make IsTrimmable=False in all assemblies that have no value #10647
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.MicrosoftAccount from 6.0.9 to 6.0.10 #10641
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authorization from 6.0.8 to 6.0.10 #10640
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Google from 6.0.9 to 6.0.10 #10639
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Facebook from 6.0.9 to 6.0.10 #10638
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView from 6.0.8 to 6.0.10 #10637
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.JSInterop from 6.0.9 to 6.0.10 #10636
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22504.1 to 7.0.0-preview1.22511.2 #10642
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Tests] Ignore tooltip tests #10649
  • Fix top-left aligned shapes issue #10417
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1343.22 to 1.0.1370.28 #10606
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [MacCatalyst] Fix issue rendering background gradient in catalyst searchbar #10615
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #10625
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • [Android] Implement PointerGestureRecognizer for Android #10352
    area/gestures
  • [iOS] Handle focus changes for UIButton #10614
  • [Windows] Fix shadows on shapes #8808
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • iOS15 WindowStateManager Window Support #10550
    area/lifecycle 🔁, platform/iOS 🍎, area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [Android] Improve CollectionView scrolling #10523
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/perf 🏎️, area/collectionview 📃
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web from 6.0.8 to 6.0.9 #10113
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, Blazor ❤️ MAUI
  • [Windows] Fix crash in WebView updating the Source two times in a row #10456
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
